sense.def:
Obdobje, dogodek, oseba ali stvar, ki je
next
, pride takoj za sedanjo ali pravkar omenjeno.

seg.quote: The next five years are of vital importance.
The next day, I left better prepared.
I may vote for her at the next election.
My next question is, ‘What is art?’

sense.def:
Z izrazom
next
opisujemo tudi kraj, prostor ali osebo, ki je tik ob nas ali do katere najprej pridemo.

seg.quote: The telephone was ringing in the next room.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
happens next
, se zgodi takoj za nečim drugim.

seg.quote: The audience does not know what is going to happen next.

sense.def:
Kadar človek nekaj naredi
next
, tisto naredi prvič od zadnjega takega dejanja.

seg.quote: It was some years later when I next saw her.

sense.def:
Izraz
next
pomeni, da ima nekaj določeno lastnost v večji meri kot vse druge sorodne stvari razen ene. Na primer, stvar, ki je
next best
, je druga najboljša med vsemi.

seg.quote: The best kind of story is the one with a happy ending; the next best is the one with an unhappy ending.

sense.def:
Kadar je neka stvar
next to another thing
, je ob tisti drugi stvari.

seg.quote: She went and sat next to him.
There was a bowl of goldfish next to the bed.

sense.def:
Izraz
after next
uporabljamo v zvezah kot
the week after next
kot oznako za obdobje, ki sledi naslednjemu iste vrste. Na primer, v mesecu maju je
the month after next
julij.

seg.quote: He had to go there the week after next.

sense.def:
Izraz
next to
lahko uporabljamo tudi v pomenu skoraj.

cit.quote: tako rekoč, skoraj, bolj ali manj

seg.quote: I knew next to nothing about him.
The photographs were next to useless but they were all we had.
